signed_description: This document has been signed by you.
unsigned_description: This document has not been signed by you.
remove_document_description: Are you sure you want to remove this document? This action cannot be undone.
remove_document_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this document {name}? This action cannot be undone.
failed_delete_document_description: Document {name} failed to delete. Please try again later.
sign_document_confirmation: Are you sure you want to sign this document? This action cannot be undone.
sign_document_confirmation_description: By signing this document, you agree to sign this document electronically and acknowledge that your signature has the same legal effect as a handwritten signature.
failed_to_sign_document_description: Document {name} failed to sign. Please try again later.
SIGN: {user} has signed this agenda on {date}. By signing this document by {user}, this document is considered valid and legally binding.
CREATE: {user} has created this agenda on {date}. By issuing this document by {user}, {user} is fully responsible for the contents of this document.
UPDATE: {user} has updated this agenda on {date}. By updating this document by {user}, {user} is fully responsible for the contents of this document.
DELETE: {user} has deleted this agenda on {date}. By deleting this document by {user}, this document is no longer valid and has no legal effect.
ARCHIVE: {user} has archived this agenda on {date}. By archiving this document by {user}, this document is no longer valid and has no legal effect.
UNARCHIVE: {user} has unarchived this agenda on {date}. By unarchiving this document by {user}, this document is considered valid and legally binding.
